wekadancer

Class Learner

  • java.lang.Object
    • wekadancer.Learner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Learner
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

    The Learner class

    This class implement the operations of a thread that will read the specified data, either from an '.anff' file or an InfluxDB database and will call the Weka library to identify any possible patterns.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Learner

        public Learner(java.lang.String db_host,
       java.lang.String db_name,
       java.lang.String series,
       java.lang.String arffName,
       Learner.LEARNER_ALGORITHM algorithm,
       java.util.Date from,
       java.util.Date until)
        throws java.lang.Exception

        The class constructor

        It requires the names of the database host, the database name, the ARFF file name, the learning algorithm, and the from and until dates that we'll be getting the data (data range).

        Parameters:
        db_host - The database host to connect to
        db_name - The database name to be queried
        arffName - The name of the '.arff' file, if needed
        algorithm - The name of the learning algorithm to be used
        from - The start time-stamp of the learning procedure
        until - The stop time-stamp of the learning procedure
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()

        The run function

        This function connects to the database, obtains the data, and calls the Weka library.

        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • callWeka

        public PandaLib.Group callWeka(java.lang.String module,
                      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> headers,
                      java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.Long,java.util.Vector<java.lang.Double>> data,
                      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> action)
                        throws java.lang.Exception

        The callWeka function

        This function loads the data to Weka and runs the selected learning algorithm.

        Parameters:
        module - The module for which the learning will be run
        headers - The names of the attributes to be examined
        data - The data to be examined
        action - The names of the actions to be mined
        Returns:
        rules
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
